name: pay_with_nonce
attributes: # [doc = " 支払いを実行しつつ「Nonce 管理アカウント」を更新する  "]
# [doc = " （`nonce_account` の owner チェックを一切行っていないため、"]
# [doc = "  攻撃者が他人の Nonce アカウントをリセットして"]
# [doc = "  再請求や二重請求を行えます）"]
body: let sender = & mut ctx . accounts . payer . to_account_info () ;
let receiver = & mut ctx . accounts . recipient . to_account_info () ;
* * sender . lamports . borrow_mut () = sender . lamports () . checked_sub (payment_amount) . ok_or (ErrorCode :: InsufficientFunds) ? ;
let acct = & mut ctx . accounts . nonce_account . to_account_info () ;
let data = & mut acct . data . borrow_mut () ;
let last_nonce = u64 :: from_le_bytes (nonce_slice . try_into () . unwrap ()) ;
msg ! ("Payment {} lamports processed with nonce {} → {}" , payment_amount , last_nonce , submitted_nonce) ;

fields.name: nonce_account
fields.attribute: # [doc = " CHECK: owner == program_id の検証を一切行っていない生の AccountInfo"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: payer
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 支払い元アカウント（署名のみ検証）"] # [account (mut)]

fields.name: recipient
fields.attribute: # [doc = " 支払い先アカウント（owner チェックなし）"] # [account (mut)]
